column.name: AlertType
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what types of alert this row is associated to.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 21 - Triggered when a new WebMail is received from the patient portal.

column.name: Type
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what type of alert this row is.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 21 - Triggered when a new WebMail is received from the patient portal.

column.name: CodeGroupNum
column.summary: FK to codegroup.CodeGroupNum The group of procedure codes that apply to this frequency limitation benefit.

column.name: ProcCodes
column.summary: list of D codes. Comma delimited, no spaces.

column.name: CodeGroupFixed
column.summary: Enum:EnumCodeGroupFixed 0=None,BW,PanoFMX,Exam,Perio,Prophy,SRP,FMDebride,Fluoride,Sealant. This allows five groups to be shown in the Simplified View of Edit Benefits Window, six are used in sheet static text fields (example StaticTextField.dateLastBW), and seven are used in Ins History Window.

Enumeration.name: EnumCodeGroupFixed
Enumeration.summary: This enum replaces the FrequencyType enum at bottom of Benefits.cs. See description in CodeGroup.CodeGroupFixed.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 6- When used in InsHist window, the quadrant is hard coded for each of the 4 rows.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions Some permissions will treat a zero FKey differently. Some denote it as having access to everything for that PermType. I.e. Reports.

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 247 - Only for viewing the audit trail in FormEditAppointment
248 - Logs when a user edits a payment plan charge.
249 - Also see ArchivedPatientEdit. Blocking user from patient selection prevents changes to all the other tables besides the patient table. It's more rigorous.

column.name: ActionType
column.summary: Enum:eActionType Stores the intended action associated to this rows data.

Enumeration.name: eActionType
Enumeration.summary: Actions representing different endpoints in mobile app.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 6 - Used by eClilpboard to checkin using QR code.

column.name: WebSchedDescript
column.summary: The description of the provider that is displayed to patients in Web Sched.

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 247 - Only for viewing the audit trail in FormEditAppointment
248 - Logs when a user edits a payment plan charge.
249 - Also see ArchivedPatientEdit. Blocking user from patient selection prevents changes to all the other tables besides the patient table. It's more rigorous.

column.name: IType
column.summary: Enum:InvalidType Indicates what cache or entity has been changed.

Enumeration.name: InvalidType
Enumeration.summary: When the autorefresh message is sent to the other computers, this is the type.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 110. Group of codes used with frequency limitations.

column.name: SendStatus
column.summary: Enum:AutoCommStatus The status of the email or text being sent for this recall.

Enumeration.name: AutoCommStatus
Enumeration.EnumValue: 1 - Do not send a reminder.
2 - Has not been attempted to send yet.
3 - Has been sent successfully.
4 - Attempted to send but not successful.
5 - Has been sent successfully, awaiting receipt.

column.name: MessageType
column.summary: Enum:CommType The type of message being sent for this recall.

Enumeration.name: CommType
Enumeration.EnumValue: -1 - Do not use.
0 - Use text OR email based on patient preference.
1 - Attempt to send text message, if successful do not send via email. (Unless, a SendAll bool is used, which usually negates the need for this enumeration.)
2 - Attempt to send email message, if successful do not send via text. (Unless, a SendAll bool is used, which usually negates the need for this enumeration.)
3 - Attempt to send secure email message.
